data.text:
About This Site

Welcome to The Crooked Wanderer. This is a blog about music. I mostly deal with metal and rock, sometimes country or hip-hop and every so often mainly some other genre.

I typically discuss albums and/or songs. I do occasionally veer off into pieces on issues or other things affecting the music community. Other oddball stuff pops up from time to time.

Post Schedule

I typically post on Monday, Wednesday and Friday. Other posts come up from time to time on other days.

Mondays I have an Album of the Week feature, where I discuss an album. Wednesdays is a Song of the Week feature where, you guessed it, I talk about a song. I typically have a running deep dive series involving Iron Maiden going on Fridays, posts that come up on other days of the week can be about whatever.

About Me

My name is Burch. I have been listening to music since the early 1980’s and teachers in high school told me I was decent at writing so that qualifies me as an expert in writing about music.

More seriously, I did blog in some form or another from 1998 through 2011. I decided to start up again in mid-2021 due to boredom, mid-life crisis, or whatever.

Other than music, my interests include cycling, drinking IPAs and watching World War II documentaries.

Contact

Email– bigbadburch@crooked-wanderer.com
